comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Given the date of February 27, 1971, the airline (KLM), and the type of aircraft (Boeing 747), the identity of this aircraft is certainly PH-BUA, a Boeing 747-206B (c/n 19922/96) named "The Mississippi" by KLM.  Delivered to KLM in January 1971 (KLM's first 747), this aircraft would continue in service with KLM until September 1989, when it was sold to America West Airlines (AWA) and operated as N531AW.  The aircraft would eventually be scrapped in Kingman, Arizona, USA, in February 1996.

comment.author: 29998366@N02
comment._content:
@TVL1970
